AIMSLab_server_interaction

Class AIMSLabServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AIMSLab_server_interaction.AIMSLabServer

  • public class AIMSLabServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a stub class, that imitates the output of the AIMSLabServer and substitutes its role for testing aims. Implemented as a singleton.
    Author:
    Enrico Ferro

    • Method Detail

      • createProjectFromMeasures

        public java.io.File createProjectFromMeasures(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> measures)
        This method substitutes the json creation process. A local file is used instead and returned. In the real version of the method, it is intended to generate a json representing the project given the measures in input.
        Parameters:
        measures - the measures list input for the project
        Returns:
        json file to be analyzed

      • getInstance

        public static AIMSLabServer getInstance()
        Method used to retrieve the only instance of the class.
        Returns:
        Returns the only instance of the singleton class

      • getProjects

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.io.File> getProjects()

      • retrieveProjectByID

        public java.io.File retrieveProjectByID(int id)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method substitutes the searching project process. It requires an id and returns the corresponding project json if found, throws an error exception otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the project requested
        Returns:
        The method returns the project json if found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - generic exception notifying an error during searching

      • saveProject

        public void saveProject(java.io.File project,
                        int id)
        This method substites the saving process. First it verifies if the project is in the server. Depending on this updates or adds the project file in the map.
        Parameters:
        project - file of the project we want to add
        id - project id

      • searchProject

        public boolean searchProject(int id)
        Simple method to search for a project by id. Returns true if there is a project with the specified id, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id - project id requested
        Returns:
        true if project found, false otherwise

      • setProjectJsonPath

        public static void setProjectJsonPath(java.lang.String projectJsonPath)
